name: Maela
appearance: Stocky scholar with obsidian-chipped beard rings, a copper-stained thumb, and reading slits cut into her leather gloves.
character: Pedantic but kind; believes records are breath for the city and takes every whisper of law seriously.
talents: feels faint fault murmurs through fingertips
dreams: to compile a true map-song to the Singing Gate
to author a concord between Chainwright timetables and Loom edicts
secrets: keeps a forbidden copy of a map-song hidden behind a loose glass shelf
quietly altered a judgment knot to spare a miner from punitive fees
